comment.author: 10214191@N02
comment._content: Do you have any photographs of the interior of the Agricultural exhibits palace or know of a resource for those?  My Uncle Charles Camp represented Wyoming with an exhibit there and I'd love to find a good photo of the little building he built to show his movies.

comment.author: 34586311@N05
comment._content: We don't, but I think the Oregon Historical Society is the place for you. I wrote a long narrative about the Expo to go with the set this one is a part of (www.flickr.com/photos/osucommons/sets/72157619653342096/w...) with links to other resources.
